page.title: 07MACDONALDS COMES TO CLACTON
page.content: Grimwade and Clark was one of Clacton's oldest shops. It has been pulled down to be replaced by MacDonalds.MacDonalds have won their year long fight to put their restraunt by the sea.MacDonalds will create a lot of new jobs but some people think there are already too many food places in Clacton.MacDonalds hope to have the restaurant built by the summer of 1986. When MacDonalds is built, other places like the Wimpy Bar are going to find they have less customers than they used to. MacDonalds wanted their restaurant up by the sea because they felt they would get more customers. I think when Macdonalds opens small stands by the beach won't sell so many packets of chips and burgers as they used to.I think MacDonalds will be kept busy at first but then it won't be quite so busy.
